title: The Becoming
description: THIS PARTICULAR KINDLE EDITION IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE.In a world where things like vampires, succubi, ghosts, and werewolves are nothing but mere characters of fiction, Alleyhill definitely stands out. Vampires, werewolves, witches, angels, secret orders, Alleyhill's got it all...and it sits right on the gates of hell. Ellicia might have witnessed her fatherâ€™s heart get ripped out from his chest right before her eyes, but her life only begins when she turns 17. She's got choices to make and can do without the distractions in Alleyhill. After all, she's the chosen one, the protector of the hell gates.
author: Kay Ikejiani
